data.message: did you get rid of the thankful reaction? i thought it was a nice addition to the reaction set you have

replies.message: Hi Michael. This feature was something we created to help celebrate Mother’s Day. Stay tuned for more special features in the future! -Jessica

Facebook Please be prompt on returning a message! I'm trying my near best to recover my old account. Please return to me with a way to access my old account without access to my old email. This is getting impossible
I have no other options. I have a new number

Hi Chance. You may be able to get back into your Facebook account by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. Keep in mind that you'll only see these options if you set them up. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2qWkX4d. -Brittany
Facebook so there isn't a way i could contact a rep or anyone where i could confirm identity :( it has been 2 years since i last logged in
I dont have any other options but email and cell#
how to get thankful reaction please say
